---

# useSignerStatus

Hook to get the signer status, optionally using an override configuration.

## Import

```ts
import { useSignerStatus } from "@account-kit/react";
```

## Usage

```ts
import { useSignerStatus } from "@account-kit/react";

const signerStatus = useSignerStatus();
```

## Parameters

### override

`AlchemyAccountContextProps`
optional configuration to override the default context

## Returns

`UseSignerStatusResult`
the current state of the signer
